Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

All right I know that was a little melodramatic but it got you to read this.  
The council has come to an UNANIMOUS decision on some new rules.  There are 
to be NO replies to this over the group.  If you must reply then do so 
directly to the council.

1) If the council receives numerous complaints about any player, the council, 
by unanimous decision will create a poll allowing the group as a whole to 
vote on whether or not that person should be banned from the group.  This 
poll will be concluded after one week.  If the vote is that they should stay 
then they shall be immune from being put up in another poll for 1 week.

2) With the restart ALL factions must have at least three players actively 
participating.

3) With the restart a player may have only 5 characters.  A gestalt team will 
count as three of them.

4) VOTE ON THE DATE OF THE RESTART, IT'S IMPORTANT!

--part1_33.22362559.299740fd_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

<BR>
<BR>1) If the council receives numerous complaints about any player, the council, by unanimous decision will create a poll allowing the group as a whole to vote on whether or not that person should be banned from the group.  This poll will be concluded after one week.  If the vote is that they should stay then they shall be immune from being put up in another poll for 1 week.
<BR>
<BR>2) With the restart <B>ALL</B> factions must have at least three players actively participating.
<BR>
<BR>3) With the restart a player may have only 5 characters.  A gestalt team will count as three of them.
<BR>
<BR>4) VOTE ON THE DATE OF THE RESTART, IT'S IMPORTANT!</FONT></HTML>
